titleStmt.title: Saints blessed for ever: or, God's people never forsaken asuring every true believer, of their blessed estate, and condition: very profitably to read, and comfortable to every believing soul that truly fears God. Being a rich portion of Gods love to his people; and worthy to be kept in memory for ever. Together with several perswasions to poor sinners, to leave their sins, and come to Christ by repentance. By Roger Hough.
titleStmt.author: Hough, Roger.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by E. Crowch, for T. Vere, at the sign of the Cock in S. Johns-street,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: God's people never forsaken.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
